detaileddescription.para: Creates a new lexer to parse the code.
Frees the memory allocated by syx_lexer_new.
Frees the memory allocated for a SyxToken.
The only way the token can be freed is only when it holds a string. In that case, the string is freed
Returns the next token parsed by the lexer
Get the next chunk of code separated ending with an exlamation mark (!).

simplesect.para: A string containing the chunk without the exlamation mark. It must be freed once it's not needed anymore

detaileddescription.para: Returns the last token returned by syx_lexer_next_token
Returns the last character returned by syx_lexer_forward
